title: First Look: The Fustle Lakelander Gravel Race Bike Floats Vibration-Damping Linkage
content:
Northern Ireland's Fustle floats a new elastomer-sprung linkage design for 12.5mm of rear-end compliance on the all-new Lakelander Gravel Bike.

Read the full article at First Look: The Fustle Lakelander Gravel Race Bike Floats Vibration-Damping Linkage on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
